ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Necklace of Superiority. (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Again I reitterate... I want to know if anyone has LOOTED one AFTER te hole came out. Does me no good that you got 6 of them (When he dropped it everytime) if
ygData.messageBody:
Again I reitterate...

I want to know if anyone has LOOTED one AFTER te hole came out.

Does me no good that you got 6 of them (When he dropped it everytime) if it is no longer the common
(Obvious) or wether it has indeed been moved (Likely) or changed to his Rare (Most likely).

I was camping The Kly for over 24 hours in two days. Saw two, and got helmets both times. That is why I am
asking for confirmation that it is still on The Kly. If it is, then I can still camp it waiting like any
other rare....if not. Then Dalnir's is not a place I need to ever go again =)

blitz_krieg@... wrote:

> They're all stories, even if they're true. :)
>
> I haven't been there since The Hole open, so I can't confirm or deny
> this rumor, but PRE-The Hole, I have seen 6 drop and have physically
> looted 4 (between my GF who sits right next to me on my LAN and I).
>
> Keep in mind that "The Kly Overseer" is NOT who you're looking for.
> He's the placeholder and he doesn't even seem to have a rare drop.
> You get better loot from the various lesser klys in the room. "The
> Kly" (that's his whole name), spawns less than 5% of the time in my
> experience and his ONLY drop AFAIK is the Necklace of Superiority.
> There may be a rare drop, but I have not heard of it. And, I can't
> imagine another item I'd rather get, so I'd be pretty pissed off if
> it wasn't the necklace on him, heh.
>
> So, if you've seen The Kly and have not looted the necklace, then
> chances are it's been moved. If you have only seen The Kly Overseer,
> then you haven't done enuf time. :) We've killed over 160 Overseers
> and have seen 6 The Klys, including a stretch of 16 hours or so
> without any at all and 2 The Klys back to back. (Of course this is
> mostly 4 - 6 hour camps stretched over several days.)
>
> Please let me know if you have seen "The Kly" and he did not drop the
> Necklace as I was intending to go back very soon. The trade offers I
> get for the necklace are just too great to pass up and my neck spot
> is now open. So far, I've gotten 1) GE Boots and Impskin Gloves, 2)
> Froglock Bonecaster's Robe, 3) Arbitor's Combine Longsword, Runed
> Lava Pendant, Slime Coated Harpoon, 4) Cobalt Gaunts and Rothyl's
> Channeling Crystal.
>
> Darkfox Reven'tsol
> Xegony
>
> Not a huge milestone anymore, but one for me, nonetheless.... DING 50!
>
> --- In eqbards@egroups.com, Randy Keith <Kalekona@u...> wrote:
> > Has ANYONE seen this drop. I don't want to hear stories. I
> > want to know if someone has actually seen, and clicked it to
> > pick up.
> >
> > I was camping The Kly this weekend, and saw NOTHING but a
> > silly helm. Lore no less.
> >
> > I have heard rumors from it being removed, being made the
> > rare drop, to being moved to The Hole. Can anyone
> > substantiate where this item is anymore?
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Was the salesman clueless? Productopia has the answers.
> http://click.egroups.com/1/4633/13/_/451022/_/962816630/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
